creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: green with red; 7/8"-1-1/4" woven bands of pattern separated by 1/2" wide black and tan woven stripes; 4-1/2"-6" warp fringe at both ends (knotted at very end)
title: Head Scarf
